General.Name: Thunder Power Holdings, Inc.
General.Description: Thunder Power Holdings, Inc. develops and manufactures electric vehicles. It offers the Coupe, Compact City Car, Long-Range Sedan, and Long-Range SUV. The company is headquartered in Wilmington, Delaware.
